articles.title: Neil Sedaka, the singer-songwriter behind dozens of hits, dies at 86
articles.description:
Sedaka, whose hits included “Breaking Up Is Hard to Do” and “Laughter in the Rain,” died Friday.

The post Neil Sedaka, the singer-songwriter behind dozens of hits, dies at 86 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Neil Sedaka, iconic singer-songwriter, passed away at 86 on February 27, 2026.
Sedaka was known for hits like 'Breaking Up Is Hard to Do' and 'Laughter in the Rain.'
His death marks a significant loss for Boston's music community and fans of classic pop.

articles.title: US stocks sink and oil prices rise as worries about AI, inflation and war hit Wall Street
articles.description:
The S&P 500 fell 29.98 points to 6,878.88. The Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 521.28 to 48,977.92, and the Nasdaq composite sank 210.17 to 22,668.21.

The post US stocks sink and oil prices rise as worries about AI, inflation and war hit Wall Street appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: S&P 500 fell 29.98 points to 6,878.88 amid economic concerns.
Dow Jones dropped 521.28 to 48,977.92, affecting local investors.
Rising oil prices may increase costs for Boston residents and businesses.

articles.title: AG announces indictment against 30 more people who protested at a Minnesota church
articles.description:
In total, 39 people now face charges of conspiracy against religious freedom and interfering with the right of religious freedom.

The post AG announces indictment against 30 more people who protested at a Minnesota church appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: AG indicts 30 additional protesters for interfering with religious freedom at a Minnesota church.
Total of 39 individuals now face conspiracy charges related to the protests.
Boston residents may see increased scrutiny on protests affecting religious rights.
